text_block_list.text:
Came the day of the Selection Race, and T.M. Opera O's 
words still weighed on my mind.

Hoping to pick up even a sliver of what goes 
through hers, I decided to go see the race.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh… It's a surprise to find you here.
choice_data_list: I wanted to try and understand you better.
I wanted to try and understand you better.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hahah, that's something I can only heartily welcome! Take in the race to your heart's content!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: …… Ah, it seems my rivals have arrived meanwhile.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Heyas, Ope! Are you also looking forward to the race?♪

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: U-Umm… I don't think I'll do well but I'll try my best!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-ha! You both sound excited to get going! I'll be expecting an intense race!

The Selection Race on which many horsegirls' 
futures were riding had begun!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: The glory of victory belongs… to yours truly…!!

The race was a hard fought battle all the way through, but as 
the finish neared, T.M. Opera O managed to slip ahead ——

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Phew…… phu… haah……
Though not by much, T.M. Opera O had finished in first place.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Fwuuh… I was so close……

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Pheeh… pheeeh…… You two are really fast～!

Though T.M. Opera O had come victorious over 
her rivals, she didn't look that pleased about it.
choice_data_list: You did great, coming first and all.
You did great, coming first and all.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I suppose that's true, you could look 
at it that way. Nevertheless…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah……

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's wrong with Ope…?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: …… Maybe she's not happy with how she won.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Umm… this is just what I think and I could be way off… 
I know I'm probably way off… but……

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Opera O always sets her goals so high that I need 
to do the same to stand a chance.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
She always seems to have "the power and dignity 
of the high king" in mind… So she probably doesn't 
like winning by such a narrow margin……
The power and dignity of the high king… It would explain her uncharacteristic behavior.

Sounds like even where races and running are concerned, 
she genuinely tries to stick to her ideal of this "high king".

My mind wrapped up in thoughts of her, I set off in pursuit. 
When I finally caught up, the sky had clouded a dark grey.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer……

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Which do you prefer between a clear sky and an overcast one?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yours truly loves clear skies. For it is a sky in which 
the sun's radiance fills us all with courage.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
About my ambitions, my dear. 
… Let me perhaps tell you a story first.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: As a child, yours truly was once lost in a forest.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Not knowing where I was, with simply the dark shades 
of the forest all around me, I felt like I was the only person 
left in the whole world.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
… Ah, but yours truly was blessed. 
For deep in the forest I had an encounter.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: With a single horsegirl who would change my destiny.
choice_data_list: A horsegirl who'd change your destiny?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That's right… As I wandered among the trees, I arrived 
at a spring nestled deep within their midst.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
From the bright, clear water's surface she smiled 
at me, telling me that everything would be alright.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Her image was more powerful… more beautiful than anything 
I'd ever seen, and my heart skipped a few beats…!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: I was in awe that a being exuding such brilliance existed…!
choice_data_list: Hold it. The water surface? You mean…
Hold it. The water surface? You mean…

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Yes — precisely! The horsegirl in the spring — it was yours truly!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I was veritably thunderstruck! That yours truly would be so 
radiant, so brimming with hope that it emanated from me!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
To what degree would this radiance, this shine, 
be polished were I to become the absolute ruler, 
The Era's High King!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Would I not become as the sun, beaming down upon the world!?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Thus yours truly endeavors! To become a horsegirl 
as the sun, bathing the people in joy and blessings!!

I'm not sure I get all that. 
However ——

I can feel T.M. Opera O's strong and earnest desire 
to become "The Era's High King".

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: —— Oh dear?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Would you look at that! The sky is regaining its luster!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That is it, that radiance…… It is precisely 
the undeniable radiance that I search for…!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hahah, yours truly can not continue to spend her time here. I must return to the high king's training, with an eye on my next victory!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: I thank you for showing me the way, dear Sol! Ha-ha-ha-ha! Haaa-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!!

I saw the light of hope reflected in T.M. Opera O's eyes 
as she stared into the sky, twinkling brightly.
